amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the premature reintroduction of an endangered salmon species in an uninhabitable river such as the San Joaquin River.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 26 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds to be used to reintroduce California Central Valley Spring Run Chinook salmon.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Denham amendment (A058) Agreed to by voice vote.
